# list_sample_texts { #moodswing.data.list_sample_texts }

```python
data.list_sample_texts(filename=_DEFAULT_SAMPLE)
```

Return a list of available document IDs from the bundled sample corpus.

## Parameters {.doc-section .doc-section-parameters}

| Name     | Type   | Description                               | Default           |
|----------|--------|-------------------------------------------|-------------------|
| filename | str    | Name of the pickled corpus file to query. | `_DEFAULT_SAMPLE` |

## Returns {.doc-section .doc-section-returns}

| Name   | Type        | Description                                 |
|--------|-------------|---------------------------------------------|
|        | list\[str\] | Document IDs of all available sample texts. |

## Examples {.doc-section .doc-section-examples}

```python
>>> from moodswing.data import list_sample_texts
>>> available = list_sample_texts()
>>> print(available)
['madame_bovary', 'portrait_of_the_artist', ...]
```
